timeline.message:
[Core]Adding orderReference support to core
[Bitmex] Adding orderReference support on adaptUserTrade
Changing name from orderReference to orderUserReference

timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText: please also make Trade immutable again as I see that its you who added two setters there a year ago
replies.author: walec51

replies.bodyText: OK, i will delete the two setters on Trade.
replies.author: makarid

replies.bodyText: I will completely delete the two maker and taker fields and i will add the orderUserReference to the UserTrade constructor. Is this what you want?
replies.author: makarid

timeline.message: [Core] Convert all Trade and UserTrade from constructor to Builder creation.
